brief_title: Assessment of Potential Interactions Between Methamphetamine and Bupropion - 1
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess potential interactions between intravenous (IV) methamphetamine and oral bupropion.
detailed_description: This is a human laboratory clinical pharmacology study to assess potential interactions between IV methamphetamine challenge and treatment with oral sustained-release bupropion.
